summary: Like a warped fun-house mirror, the song-poem industry has run parallel to the mainstream music business for close to a century; it's estimated that over 200,000 song-poems have been ... See full summary »
cast: Tom Ardolino|Sonny Cash|Del Casher|Jo Comberiate|Ellery Eskelin|Gary Forney|David Fox|Van Garner|Will Gentry|Art Kaufman|John Lewis|Gene Merlino|Jean-Paul Monsche|Nilson V. Ortiz|Caglar Juan Singletary|John Trubee|Waskel Elwood Walls Jr.
title: Off the Charts: The Song-Poem Story
